review: I used to watch netflix via my TV app, The Fire is much better in quality and sound. I also like seeing photographs and videos that I have taken with my iphone that automatically gets uploaded. As an Amazon prime member it is nice to be able to find shows by talking into the mic. I am very happy with my purchase.
author: drpret "Preetham"

review: So far I have been quite impressed with the Fire and it's capabilities. The responsivness is excellent as is the voice command.  I am however disappointed with the bait and switch on programming. I chose Amazon Prime because of the  benifits and decided the extra cost was acceptable. I was recently informed of a price increase for the membership and decided that also was accpetable. What I find unaccepable is a season or two of a series that is free with Prime membership and an additional charge to to be able to finish the series. I do hope Amazon reconsiders this practice. Other than that, I have been completely satisfied with Prime which has resulted in Amazon being my first choice for all my on-line purchases.
